con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:chargeCustomer> <!--type: string--> <externalContractId>gero et</externalContractId> <!--type: int--> <amount>3</amount> <!--type: currency - enumeration: [EUR]--> <currency>EUR</currency> <!--type: string--> <balanceType>aeoliam venit</balanceType> <!--type: string--> <referenceId>ventos tempestatesque</referenceId> <!--type: dateTime--> <paymentDate>2018-11-01T06:36:46+01:00</paymentDate> <!--type: paymentUseCaseEnum - enumeration: [ON_DEMAND,ON_DEMAND_SMS,MONTHLY,PACKPAYMENT]--> <paymentUseCase>ON_DEMAND</paymentUseCase> <!--Optional:--> <pack> <!--type: string--> <packName>regemque dedit</packName> <!--type: string--> <packId>fremunt celsa</packId> </pack> </cus:chargeCustomer> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
